name: Bacon Wrapped Water Chestnuts IV
author: NANCI RENN
summary: These delicious wrapped water chestnuts are a great finger food appetizer. I serve them when my sorority meets at my house. Enjoy!
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Wrap single pieces of bacon around individual water chestnuts, securing with a toothpick
Place the wrapped water chestnuts on a large baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven 20 minutes, or until the bacon is crisp
In a medium bowl, mix the mayonnaise, white sugar, dill pickle relish and ketchup
Pour the mixture over the wrapped water chestnuts
Bake in the preheated oven 10 minutes, or until the sauce is hot and bubbly
